body.p:
Covington July 6th 1861
Genl S B Buckner
Please accept this resignation as Major of 1st Battalion 3rd Regiment KY. S. G. business calls me from my native state & assign as the cause

Saml K Hays
Maj 1 Battalion
3 Regint Ky. S. G.
Ky State Guard
3' Regiment
Resignation
Maj. S. K Hays
July 6t 1861

Approved
H T Buckner
& Col
Com
